subtitles.text: We have the ending of our after-school secret broadcast, in which we invite a guest each time and get to know their true nature in a 23-minute cut.
I don't know... not much.

Please!
Please!

I'm Yamazaki Ten.
I'm Na Igami.

Yes, thank you, please.
